short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,: 小红书AI写作助手是一款专门为小红书博主和运营人员打造的AI创作辅助工具。主要功能有：AI文案生成、标题生成、小红书文案排版编辑器、小红书违禁词&敏感词检测、ChatGPT对话。
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Xiaohongshu AI Writing Assistant is an AI writing assistance specially designed for Xiaohongshu bloggers and operators.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,:
小红书AI写作助手通过AI文案生成、标题生成、小红书文案排版编辑器、小红书违禁词&敏感词检测、AI对话等功能为您的小红书创作提效10倍！并利用浏览器扩展技术和小红书网页端功能结合，优化您的网页版创作体验，助您轻松提升笔记创作效率，吸引更多粉丝关注！

功能描述 📋
1. 仿写爆款 ✨
快速生成与爆款内容相似的文案，吸引更多用户阅读和点赞。轻松仿写爆款笔记，迅速提高你的内容质量和人气。

2. 爆款文案生成 📝
一键生成符合小红书风格的文案，节省创作时间，提高效率。无需费心思考，轻松获得引人注目的笔记。

3. 爆款标题生成 🎯
根据热门话题和关键词，生成引人注目的标题，增加曝光率和转发量。让你的笔记在众多内容中脱颖而出，轻松吸引眼球。

4. 小红书文案排版编辑器 🖋️
支持40+小红书文案排版模板和200+表情，帮助您写出更符合小红书风格的文案。丰富的排版选择，让你的内容更具视觉吸引力。

5. 小红书敏感词检测 🚫
一键检测文案敏感词，降低笔记违规风险。确保你的内容合规发布，避免不必要的麻烦。

6. AI对话 🤖
利用AI对您的文案进行个性化的修改，直到优化到您满意为止。享受智能助手的全程陪伴，提升你的文案质量。

7. 网页版一键跳转 💻
一键跳转小红书网页版创作中心、浏览页面、私信页面。方便快捷地管理和发布内容，让你更加高效地运营账号。

使用说明 🛠️
1. 安装插件 📥：在小红书网页版浏览器中，点击插件商店，搜索“小红书笔记创作助手”，点击安装即可。
2. 使用功能 🚀：在小红书网页版编辑笔记时，点击插件页面图标，选择需要使用的功能，根据提示操作即可。

小红书AI写作助手，让创作更简单，让交流更畅快！快来体验吧！

免责声明：XHSPlus - 小红书笔记创作助手不是官方插件，该产品是 XHSPlus 的独立项目。 小红书™ 是 小红书 Inc. 的商标， XHSPlus - 小红书笔记创作助手与 小红书™ 或 小红书 Inc. 没有任何关系。
long.en:
The Xiaohongshu AI Writing Assistant boosts your Xiaohongshu creation efficiency by 10 times with features like AI content generation, title generation, content formatting editor, forbidden and sensitive word detection, and ChatGPT interactions. By integrating browser extension technology with Xiaohongshu web functions, it optimizes your web-based creation experience, making it easier to enhance your notes and attract more followers!

Feature Descriptions 📋
1. Imitate Popular Posts ✨
Quickly generate content similar to trending posts to attract more readers and likes. Easily draw inspiration from popular notes and enhance your content quality and popularity.

2. AI Text Generator 📝
Generate Xiaohongshu-style content with one click, saving creation time and improving efficiency. Effortlessly obtain engaging notes without the hassle of brainstorming.

3. AI Title Generation 🎯
Create eye-catching titles based on trending topics and keywords to increase exposure and shares. Make your notes stand out and grab attention effortlessly.

4. Emoji Editor 🖋️
Supports 40+ Xiaohongshu formatting templates and 200+ emojis, helping you create content that aligns with Xiaohongshu style. Rich formatting options make your content more visually appealing.

5. Keyword Detection 🚫
Detect sensitive words in your content with one click to reduce the risk of violations. Ensure your content is compliant and avoid unnecessary issues.

6. ChatGPT 🤖
Utilize ChatGPT for personalized modifications to your content until you are satisfied. Enjoy the full support of an intelligent assistant to enhance your content quality.

7. One-Click Web Navigation 💻
One-click access to the Xiaohongshu web creation center, browsing page, and private messaging page. Manage and publish content efficiently, making account operations smoother.

Instructions 🛠️
Install the Plugin 📥
In the Xiaohongshu web browser, click on the plugin store, search for "Xiaohongshu Note Creation Assistant," and click install.

Use the Features 🚀
While editing notes on the Xiaohongshu web version, click the plugin icon, select the desired feature, and follow the prompts.

The Xiaohongshu AI Writing Assistant makes creation simpler and communication smoother! Come and experience it now!

Disclaimer: XHSPlus - Xiaohongshu Note Creation Assistant is not an official plugin. This product is an independent project of XHSPlus. Xiaohongshu™ is a trademark of Xiaohongshu Inc. XHSPlus - Xiaohongshu Note Creation Assistant is not affiliated with Xiaohongshu™ or Xiaohongshu Inc.
